casebody.data:
William R. HENDERSON and all Others Similarly Situated, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION and Department of Corrections, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 156270
COA: 332314 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellees to extend the time for filing their supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 29, 2018.
